title: Conduct a Vendor Qualification Audit
description: A QA auditor must conduct an audit of a new raw material supplier to ensure they meet quality standards.

tasks.description: Develop an audit plan based on the type of supplier and relevant regulations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates an audit plan covering key areas like quality systems, manufacturing processes, and documentation.

tasks.description: Send a pre-audit questionnaire and document request to the vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal request for key documents ahead of the on-site audit.

tasks.description: Conduct the audit (remotely or on-site) and document any findings or observations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies two minor findings related to documentation practices.

tasks.description: Issue an audit report to the vendor and request a response with a CAPA plan for any findings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts and sends the formal audit report, and tracks the vendor's response.
